name: cryptozen
description: Modern cryptocurrency exchange platform with Asian-inspired aesthetics

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Ready for deployment to Netlify and Render'
